title: Effortless Saving
subtitle: Save What Matters
content: Don't let valuable tweets or YouTube videos slip away. Latergram lets you save what really matters — in just one click. No clutter, just clarity.

title: Organized & Accessible
subtitle: Your Digital Vault
content: All your saved content, perfectly sorted and available anytime. Whether it's a thought-provoking thread or a tutorial, your digital vault keeps it safe.

title: RAG-powered Discovery
subtitle: Smarter Search, Coming Soon
content: We're building an AI-powered search to help you retrieve saved content like never before. Ask a question — get exactly what you saved, fast.

title: Minimal, Powerful, Yours
subtitle: Made for Thinkers
content: Latergram is built for creators, learners, and deep thinkers. No ads. No noise. Just the internet's best moments, saved your way.
